login.title: Login
login.password_min_length: Password must be at least 6 characters

forgot_password.title: Forgot Password
forgot_password.headline: Reset Password
forgot_password.subtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you instructions to reset your password
forgot_password.info_message: Password reset email may take a few minutes to arrive. Check your spam folder too.
forgot_password.success_subtitle: Please check your inbox and follow the instructions to reset your password
forgot_password.success_info: Email may take a few minutes to arrive. If you don't see it, check your spam folder.
